member.office_address: Athens University of Economics and Business Main Building, Derigny ct, 3rd fl

shortcv.p: Maria Kechagia has graduated from the department of Management Science and Technology of Athens University of Economics and Business. Currently, she is a member of the SENSE group. She is interested in Information Systems and topics related to Open Source Software and E-Business. She also collaborates with the department of European Projects of SingularLogic S.A. and with the ELTRUN.
